item.title: Wood pallet and general cleaning issue, 13th November
item.description:
Wood parts left in front of 108 Bouverie by the trees The section of Bouverie Road between Manor road and Grayling Road is also very dirty with various rubbish a bit everywhere - would be great to get a deep clean!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bouverie Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Abandoned car in residents parking bay, 13th November
item.description:
A Mini has been in the residents parking bay on the west side of Pembridge Gardens close to the junction with Pembridge Square for two weeks. It's got three tickets on it so far. Please tow it away so residents can park.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Pembridge Square, Notting Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Junction of shorts gardens and Endell Street opposite 24 Endell street, 13th November
item.description:
There are 100s of lime bikes scattered all on Endell street on both sides and is a nuisance. Big vehicles find it hard to turn left or right from Shorts Gardens. This is an ongoing problem. Dangerous to cross the road as itâ€™s blocking the crossing. You need to do what Kensington and Chelsea council are doing and seize the illegally parked bikes and fine the company per bike.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Endell Street, Bloomsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet
